start: Yeah, I swear that thing’s possessed. It starts spitting out prints nonstop and who does the manager blame? Not Tony, not Karl, me.
Wow, this has got to be the sorriest excuse for haunting I’ve seen since Amityville.
Where the hell have you been? I’ve been dead for like 5 years.
Says 8 here. Details. Anyway, no time for banter, we’ve got business.
You have quite an outstanding debt. Lots of souls. Tsk, tsk.
It’s really quite simple, you multiply the number of years post mortuum-
I’ve been haunting this place forever and no one’s asked me for a thing. What’re you, my landlord?
What, you expected all this for free?
You unfortunately slipped through the cracks of the system. Mistakes do happen.
Afterall, how can you expect a Reaper to get work done on New Years when there’s champagne to be had and-
Essentially, you owe 8 years in soul taxes.
Now, since I may have been somewhat responsible for your debt, I’m willing to help you out.
Great, I've got Skeletor on my side.
Let’s start with these two losers. Possess one of them and clobber the other to death!
What?! Clobber them to-wait, I can possess people?
Yeeeaah...somebody probably should have told you that.
Go hover over one of those idiots and press spacebar to take control of them.
Use J to punch and K to kick!
end: See, that wasn’t so hard. Now you’ve got 2 less souls to go!
I'm not sure this is right...
Hey, you wanna go to the Great Beyond right now? Because I can take you there. It’s all brimstone, smoke, and Bieber music.
I figured I'd go to Heaven...
After what you just did? Hell no.
Time to find some more meat puppets.
